member.name: T:Blazorade.Mermaid.Components.HtmlRender
member.summary: This component is used to render dynamically generated HTML content that potentially contains one or more Mermaid diagram definition.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Mermaid.Components.HtmlRender.HtmlContent
member.summary: The HTML content to render.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Mermaid.Components.MermaidComponentBase
member.summary: A base class for components with Mermaid functionality.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Mermaid.Components.MermaidComponentBase.SecurityLevel
member.summary: Level of trust for parsed diagram.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Mermaid.Components.MermaidComponentBase.JSRuntime
member.summary: Injected JavaScript Runtime implementation.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Mermaid.Components.MermaidComponentBase.GetBlazoradeMermaidModuleAsync
member.summary: Returns a reference to the Blazorade Mermaid JavaScript file.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Mermaid.Components.MermaidComponentBase.GetConfig
member.summary: Returns a configuration object to send to Mermaid when rendering diagrams.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Mermaid.Components.MermaidComponentBase.InvokeRenderOnlyAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Invokes the rendering of a Mermaid diagram on the client side for the specified CSS selector.
member.remarks: This method uses the Blazorade Mermaid JavaScript module to render the diagram. Ensure that the specified selector matches an existing HTML element on the page.
member.param: The CSS selector identifying the HTML element where the Mermaid diagram should be rendered. Cannot be null or empty.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Mermaid.Components.MermaidComponentBase.InvokeRunAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Executes the Mermaid diagram rendering process for the specified element and definition.
member.remarks: This method invokes the JavaScript function responsible for rendering Mermaid diagrams in the specified HTML element. Ensure that the provided corresponds to a valid HTML element on the page and that the contains a valid Mermaid diagram syntax.
member.param: The ID of the HTML element where the Mermaid diagram will be rendered.
The Mermaid diagram definition to be rendered.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Mermaid.Components.MermaidComponentBase.InvokeMermaidModuleVoidAsync(System.String,System.Object[])
member.summary: Invokes a JavaScript function within the Blazorade Mermaid module without returning a result.
member.remarks: This method is asynchronous and ensures that the Blazorade Mermaid JavaScript module is loaded before invoking the specified function. Use this method when the JavaScript function does not return a value.
member.param: The identifier of the JavaScript function to invoke.
An optional array of arguments to pass to the JavaScript function. Can be null.
member.returns: A task that represents the asynchronous operation.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Mermaid.Components.MermaidDiagram
member.summary: Use this component to display Mermaid diagrams in your application.
member.remarks: For more information on Mermaid and what kind of diagrams you can display with it, please refer to https://mermaid.js.org/

member.name: P:Blazorade.Mermaid.Components.MermaidDiagram.Definition
member.summary: The Mermaid definition to render as a diagram.
member.remarks: Read more about Mermaid and diagrams on https://mermaid.js.org/intro/.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Mermaid.Components.MermaidDiagram.Id
member.summary: The ID for the diagram.
member.remarks: This will be automatically set on the component, if not set in your code.

member.name: M:Blazorade.Mermaid.Components.MermaidDiagram.OnElementClickCallbackAsync(Blazorade.Mermaid.Model.ElementClickCallbackArgs)
member.summary: The callback method that will be called by Mermaid JS when a diagram element is clicked.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Mermaid.Components.MermaidRender
member.summary: A component that renders any element that matches a selector into a Mermaid diagram.
member.remarks: This component can be useful if you for instance have HTML content coming from a data source where the content contains HTML content in addition to the Mermaid definitions. Then this component would render that content into diagrams.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Mermaid.Components.MermaidRender.Selector
member.summary: The selector for the elements containing Mermaid definitions to render into diagrams.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Mermaid.Model.ElementClickCallbackArgs
member.summary: Callback arguments for when a diagram element is clicked.

member.name: P:Blazorade.Mermaid.Model.ElementClickCallbackArgs.Id
member.summary: The Mermaid ID of the element that was clicked.

member.name: T:Blazorade.Mermaid.SecurityLevel
member.summary: Defines different security levels for Mermaid diagrams.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Mermaid.SecurityLevel.Strict
member.summary: Default. HTML tags in the text are encoded and click functionality is disabled.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Mermaid.SecurityLevel.Loose
member.summary: HTML tags in text are allowed and click functionality is enabled.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Mermaid.SecurityLevel.AntiScript
member.summary: HTML tags in text are allowed (only script elements are removed), and click functionality is enabled.

member.name: F:Blazorade.Mermaid.SecurityLevel.Sandbox
